summary: The module contains example command‑line tools that load a trained transducer speech‑recognition model, optionally convert it to a portable format (ONNX or TorchScript), run batched greedy decoding on a collection of audio files, and compute word‑error‑rate and related evaluation metrics.
business_intent: Showcase how to export transducer ASR models for deployment and provide a reproducible inference benchmark that helps engineers assess accuracy and performance before integrating the model into production systems.
